cause.description:
I want to see people bring out the atari, sega, NES,ect and get back to where gaming really started. Fuck 3D Hi Def, show me 2d back and white, stick people with little things that might be swords. But who knows and who cares bring them out join the revolution all over again!!!!!!!!
THE 16 BIT REVOLUTION
now in color
1. bring back retro game systems
2. enjoy them like you did back in the day
3. hell play emulators for all i care
cause.mission: to bring back the games that started all we have today
cause.name: return of retro games
